feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.135.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(telemetry): Add aggregated events and groups to posthog by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3866
  • feat: TLS cert identity auth by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3852
  • improvement(project-roles): Add type col to project roles table and default sort by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3871
  • improvement(access-policies): Revamp approval sequence table display and access request modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3869
  • update logos in docs by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3880
  • update spend policy by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3881
  • feat: resolved inefficient join for ip restriction in access token by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3882
  • improvement(org-access-control): Standardize and improve org access control UI by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3873
  • Fix bypassing approval policies by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3878
  • misc: add indices for referencing columns in identity access token by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3885
  • improvement(secret-approval-request): Color/layout styling adjustments to change request page by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3891
  • feat(secret-sync): Allow custom field label on 1pass sync by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3876
  • fix: address instanceof check in github dynamic secret by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3894
  • improvement(approval-policy): minor create policy layout adjustments by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3889
  • misc: added missing project cert endpoints to open api spec by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3893
  • feat(super-admin): Environment Overrides by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3875
  • doc: add mention of default audience support for CSI by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3883
  • misc: updated sidebar name by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3896
  • misc: add plain support for user get token in CLI by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3897
  • feat(change-approvals): block folder deletion if there is at least one secret protected by a policy by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3903
  • improvement(approval-policies): Add open request warning to remove policy modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3886
  • feat: project ui v3 by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3872
  • feat: Re-invite users every 1 week for up to a month. by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3892
  • feat: audit log improvement by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3906
  • misc: update tooltip for overwrite sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3909
  • misc: downsize worker count for secret scanning jobs by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3910
  • improvement: allow users to expand collapsed environment view header by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3904
  • Fix root folder issue with folder policies check and multi env error message improvement by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3911
  • fix(secret-folders): delete folder by ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3913
  • feat(secret-sync): add Zabbix secret sync by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3870
  • Undo Environment Variables Override PR Revert + SSO Fix by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3918
  • improvement(password-reset): re-vamp password reset flow pages/steps to match login by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3905
  • fix(secret-syncs): pass audit log info from import/delete secrets for sync endpoint by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3920
  • misc: allow users with create permission to add identities with no access by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.134.0-postgres...infisical/v0.135.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.136.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: added autoplay to loading lottie and fixed tooltip in project select by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3908
  • Add BitBucket platform to secret scanning by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3917
  • docs(api-reference/organizations): document SSO configuration endpoints by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3890
  • feat(telemetry): improve Posthog org identity logic by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3972
  • Improve + fix invitation reminder logic by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3974

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.135.0-postgres...infisical/v0.136.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.137.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(secret-imports-dashboard): support filtering imported secrets in single env view by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3977
  • feat(secret-scanning): Bitbucket data source + App Connection by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3925
  • improvement(audit-logs): Create crud events for secret approvals on merge and improve approval audit logs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3975
  • fix(typo): add missing space on integrations audit log upgrade prompt by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3981
  • fix: support email link template pre-fill by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3979
  • âœ… PR: fix infisical-schema-migration CrashLoopBackOff when upgrading to 0.133.0 #3849 by @vespersio in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3862
  • Dockerfile for mintlify docs by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3984
  • fix(migration): move logger init for standalone migration to entry knexfile by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3985

New Contributors

  • @sidwebworks made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3979
  • @vespersio made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3862

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.136.1-postgres...infisical/v0.136.2-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.138.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: add request ID to error logs by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3990
  • fix: yaml secret file parsing by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3837
  • add index for referencing columns in identity access token by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3989
  • feat: add more server admin environment overrides by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3995
  • ENG-2595 Added Railway secret sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3976
  • feat(dynamic-secrets): AWS IRSA auth method by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3930
  • improvement(audit-logs): clarify secret key/path filter behavior for audit logs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3982
  • Fix folder creation commits triggered on new folder instead of the parent by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3998
  • fix(secret-scanning-v2): Remove Jim as sole author of all secret leaks by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4000
  • improvement(frontend): Server admin sidebar improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4001
  • Allow docs to run fully offline by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4003
  • fix(approval-policies): improve policies handling by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3923
  • fix(approval-workflows): allow null committer on secret approval request and cascade delete on access request by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3997
  • feat(secret-sync): Cloudflare Workers by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3988
  • improvement(frontend): Move sso/provision settings back to org settings tabs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4007
  • improvement(frontend): use secret path input for create policy modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4002
  • feat: migrate github app connection to env override by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4004
  • Use non root user for docs Dockerfile by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4008
  • improvement(frontend): make empty value circle display on overview page yellow by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4014
  • updated changelog by @vmatsiiako in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4093
  • docs: cpp sdk by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4095
  • feat: validate db schemas CI test by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4094
  • Fix authEnforced returning a token when org has authEnforced enabled by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4101
  • improvement(frontend): Make checkbox colors more apparent and fix specific priv. checkbox styling by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4013
  • improvement(frontend): Dynamic secrets doc links by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4015
  • Optimize token cleanup job by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4011
  • improvement(access-approval): allow all users to reject their own access requests by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4103
  • Make Azure DevOps sync not require project name by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4105
  • feat(fips): native FIPS support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3973
  • improvement(frontend): update styling/consistency for navbar by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4104
  • improvement(frontend): prevent organization name wrap in header by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4109
  • improvement(frontend): show upgrade modal and access banner for secret scanning config page when feature is disabled by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4110
  • feat: Checkly app connection and secrets sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4078
  • Add missing setting for postgres app connection by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4111
  • improvement(frontend): add merge/closed status badge to closed secret change request table by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4106
  • misc: re-added EST to PKI templates by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4112
  • Minor improvement on the Postgres docs changing a warning to a tip by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4115
  • fix: oci auth for go sdk by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4152
  • feat(#2938): Add supabase app connection and secrets sync by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4113
  • Add isEmailVerified to isUserCompleted flag on samlLogin by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4175
  • Make certificate collection required by @x032205 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4176
  • fix: propogate Github app connection errors to the client properly by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4177
  • docs: document use of port 8433 for TLS certificate auth by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4180
  • improvement(access-requests): add access requests to single env view + general UI improvements by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4178
  • fix: verify response type by @sidwebworks in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4182
  • On importCertToCa use serialNumber instead of dn to get the parentCa by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4185
  • Updated CLI export doc to document the new --output-file behavior by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/4184

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.137.0-postgres...infisical/v0.138.0-postgres
